Description: Raley's agreed to pay $350,000 in settlement of allegations by the District Attorneys of Santa Clara, Shasta, Sacramento and Sonoma counties that it illegally sold over-the-counter medications and baby food and formula beyond the manufacturers' sell by or expiration dates.
Raley's agreed to pay $1.6 million to 25 District Attorneys to resolve allegations relating to the mishandling of hazardous waste.
Info Source: Raley's to pay $1.6 million to settle waste disposal suit, Sacramento Bgee, August 25, 2014 (via Nexis).

Description: Raley's agreed to pay $550,000 to six California District Attorneys to resolve allegations of illegal workers compensation practices.
Info Source: Raley's agrees to hefty penalty for workers' comp violations, Sacramento Business Journal, May 3, 2010 (via Nexis).

Private Litigation Case Title: Lucianna Borrego vs. Raleys Family of Fine Stores
